Name: Minimal
Description (Dams): Location is verified but little attribute data is captured.

Name: Moderate
Description (Dams): Location is verified, and most attribute data is captured.
Description (Waterfalls): Location and height are known-unknown if waterfall is a barrier to fish.
Description (Fishways): Location and some attributes are known.

Name: Complete
Description (Dams): Location is verified, and all attribute data is captured.
Description (Waterfalls): Location and height are known-confirmed to be a barrier to fish.
Description (Fishways): Location and all attributes are known.
